arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُنَادَوْنَ لَمَقْتُ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ مِن مَّقْتِكُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ إِذْ تُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ فَتَكْفُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	disbelievers	will	indeed	be	called	out	
to	-	“Indeed	Allah’s	disgust	with	you	is	
greater	than	your	own	abhorrence	of	
yourselves,	whereas	you	used	to	deny	
when	you	were	called	towards	the	faith!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	jihoñ	ne	kufr	kiyā		un	ko	nidā	ki	
jāye	gi	ke	zaroor	tum	se	Allāh	ki	bezāri	is	
se	bahut	zaiyāda	hai	jaise	tum	āaj	apni	jān	
se	bezār	ho	jab	ke	tum	Imān	ki	ṭaraf	bulāye	
jāte	to	tum	kufr	karte.
